review: I really like this device. I wish they can add more networks to their list of apps eg USAnetwork, ABCfamily, CW to mention a few

review: The Chromecast is pretty good for the price, but it's a pain to use in hotel rooms, which is the primary reason for even owning this.

review: Great for wireless viewing. Good thing they are a reasonable price because you will need more than one if you have more than one TV 📺.

review: Works as advertised. I found myself not using it as much as i thought i would. This is not a product fault but, mine. Pretty much stutter free through one wall into the next room about 15' distance.
